description:
Location based alerts! Let Geotasks use the power of your WebOS device's GPS to remind you to pick up the milk when you pass by the grocery store! Features include multiple location alerts, departure alerts, background functionality, GPS scanner scheduling (for power saving) and customizable alert tones. Search for alert locations by using Google local search, current location, tapping a location on a Google map, or using an address from your contacts. Never forget to pick up the milk, or drop off the videos ever again!  
******* 
New version 1.1.0 (5/27/10) - New Departure Alerts feature!  Let your WebOS device notify you after departing from a location.  Never forget to pick up the kids from daycare again!  ;-)
